# Contributor License Agreement

Thank you for your interest in contributing to Transire! Before we can accept contributions, we need you to sign a Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

## Individual Contributors

If you are contributing as an individual, please [sign the Individual CLA](https://github.com/transire/transire/issues/new?template=individual-cla.md&title=Individual%20CLA%20for%20@USERNAME).

## Corporate Contributors

If you are contributing on behalf of your employer or organization, please [sign the Corporate CLA](https://github.com/transire/transire/issues/new?template=corporate-cla.md&title=Corporate%20CLA%20for%20COMPANY_NAME).

## Why do we need a CLA?

The CLA ensures that:
1. You grant Transire maintainers the right to use your contributions
2. You confirm that you have the right to grant this license
3. You agree that your contributions will be licensed under MPL 2.0
4. The project can be maintained and distributed freely

## What happens after I sign?

Once you've signed the CLA:
1. Your GitHub username will be added to our CLA database
2. The CLA bot will automatically approve your future pull requests
3. You can start contributing to Transire!

## Questions?

If you have questions about the CLA, please open an issue or contact the maintainers.
